detaileddescription.para:
Polynomial interpolation C code mainly based on pointers.
Cristian Merli
12/04/2021
3.0 - Completed 19/04/2021
Important notes:
The algorithm supports interpolation 'till 170 points.
This software is composed by a single .c file and contains all the necessary functions (no pre-compiled libraries needed).
Bug
No known bugs.

sect1.title: Code title:
sect1.para: Polynomial interpolation with Newton algorithm and divided-differences.

sect2.title: Code details:
sect2.para: Polynomial interpolation C code --> Newton algorithm with divided-differences to interpolate 'till 170 points, polynomial evaluation in given points and derivate calculation.
